DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim trial investigate liraglutide effect QTc interval . Moxifloxacin ( AveloxÂ® ) administer positive control .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Liraglutide Heart Frequency Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Fasting plasma glucose within normal limit ( 80100 mg/dl ) BMI ( Body Mass Index ) : 20.029.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Heart rate within range 5090 beat per minute ( inclusive ) Subject judge good health basis medical history , physical examination , ECG ( electrocardiogram ) , routine laboratory data Any clinically significant disease history , opinion investigator , systemic organ disease Any clinically significant disease history , opinion investigator , cardiovascular disease Clinically significant abnormality prestudy clinical examination abnormal laboratory measurement screen A family history sudden cardiac death age le 50 year old Twave abnormality Individual familial history long QT Syndrome Positive result Screening Hepatitis B surface antigen , Hepatitis C antibody HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) antibody Positive result urine drug alcohol screen Any regular use prescription nonprescription drug vitamins herbal/nutritional supplement stop screen Any strenuous exercise ( judged investigator ) 4 day prior randomisation entire trial period Blood donation , trauma surgery blood loss exceed 500 ml within last 2 month prior dose Subject smoker , occasional smoker history smoking ( use tobacco ) within last 3 month Excessive use methylxanthinecontaining beverage ( 8 cups/day coffee , tea , soda chocolate ) Females pregnant , breastfeeding , intend become pregnant within next 3 month , judge use inadequate contraceptive measure A history ( within last 2 year ) drug alcohol abuse
